title: people (politically inclined) are trying to wedge a gap between north and south india
selftext: I'm just afraid that this type of nasty politics is going to be very dangerous in the near future and pushing north and south india apart can follow in the footsteps of partition. What are your thoughts
comments: It's all been there just that it's being used as an excuse (after loosing  the elections  ) , if they keep up with this lame excuse they'll  loose South as well .

India ka nahi to South India ko divide karke waha ka pm to ban he jayega Rahul Gandhi

/S

This needs to be condemned by everyone. 


It is through these ways narratives are planted in people's minds and if such ideas are allowed to bloom they WILL hurt us in the longer run.
sore loosers. If they go about callling north dung belt, then good luck winning here.
